songs.title: If I Ain’t Got You/Empire State of Mind
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Tulisa & All]
Mmm yeah, some people live for the fortune, yeah
Some people live just for the fame
Some people need three dozen Roses, yeah
Cause that's the only way to prove you love them
Hand me the world on a silver platter
And what good would it be?
With no one to share
With no one who truly cares for me

[Chorus: All]
Some people want it all
But I don't want nothing at all
If it ain't you, baby
If I ain't got you, baby
Some people want diamond rings
Some just want everything
But everything means nothing
If I ain't got you

[Verse 2: All]
One hand in the air for the big city
Street lights, big dreams, all looking pretty
No place in the world that can compare
Put your lighters in the air, everybody say yeah, yeah

[Chorus: All]
In New York, concrete jungle where dreams are made of
There's nothing you can't do
Now you're in New York, these streets will make you feel brand new
Big lights will inspire you
Hear it for New York, New York, New York
